name: TennisHero
description:
Game Made for Ludum Dare 41  (Theme :  Combine 2 Incompatible Genres )

Bullet Hell+Tennis/Block Breaker?Whatever.

In this game,you need to use your tennis racket to hit the bullets back，and kill your enemies.It's easy to control,use your mouse to move your character,and click to wave the racket.when you hit a bullet,your move direction will influence the bullet's direction,you can use that to kill your enemies more accurate.

Ludum Dare page:https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/41/tennis-hero
